item.title: Got into AWS Community Builders Program
item.description:
Exciting News!!! I have been accepted into the AWS community Builder Program in the category of Containers!

Thank you Jason Dunn for the opportunity and looking forward to contributing for the AWS Community Builders program.

Special Thanks to Rajdeep Saha, AWS Community Nordics, Rolf Koski, Petri Rosenstr√∂m, Prasad Rao, Ashish Prajapati, Parna Mehta, Aritra Nag, Darryl Ruggles, Darya Petrashka, and Saurabh Shrivastava for inspiring me and helping me in my AWS journey.

If you are new to my posts, I regularly post about AWS, EKS, Kubernetes and Cloud computing related topics. Do follow me in LinkedIn and visit my dev.to posts. You can find all my previous blog posts in my blog
